infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Håfa Recipes needs access to your camera to take photos of your recipes. For example, you can photograph a handwritten family recipe or a dish you've prepared to add as a recipe image.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Håfa Recipes needs access to your photo library to select images for your recipes. For example, you can choose a photo of a finished dish to use as the recipe thumbnail.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Håfa Recipes uses speech recognition to let you ask questions about recipes using your voice.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Håfa Recipes needs access to your microphone to convert your voice to text when asking questions about recipes.
